item.title: CHWY
item.description: score:36 Chances: Chewy (CHWY) has seen solid earnings estimate revision activity over the past month, and belongs to a strong industry as well. The Zacks Earnings ESP is a great way to find potential earnings surprises. Why investors should take advantage now. The online pet retailer’s high-growth days could be over.
